name: Lord Murugan
description:
This 140' (42.7 meters) golden statue of Lord Murugan stands outside the Temple Complex at Batu Caves, near Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.  Lord Murugan (also know as Kartikeya) is the Hindu God of War. He is a son of Parvati and Shiva, and a brother of Ganesha who is sometimes known as the "elephant god".
As can be seen in the photo, there are 272 steps leading up to the cave complex, winding around behind the very large statue.

This original digital photo was taken January, 2009.
